localised_text.tooltip_text: Event instant popup settings || When turned on, events from an event category will show on screen as a popup when issued. Turning it off will only display the event in the Event Messages list instead

template_row.comment: The icon component will be dynamically be appended by EventMessageIcon callback

events_list.comment: if the header is selected or about to be selected ( down always leads to selected )

slider_parent.comment: We have this separate slider parent so can get list scaling correctly with slider fitting nicely inside for listview since all layout uses list engines. Need to set visibility of this based on slider at all times to work properly
